issue.title: [C++] Refactor and make IPC read / write APIs more consistent, add appropriate deprecations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1408](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1408). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In light of work in ARROW-1055 to make mixed-device IPC easier, I'm doing some refactoring to remove certain functions that were exposed in the public API unintentially. Some of these need to be deprecated, while others not.
